parameters.name: X-IBM-Client-Id
parameters.description: Id of the Client

parameters.name: X-IBM-Client-Secret
parameters.description: Secret password generated for the Client

parameters.name: X-Nordea-Originating-User-Agent
parameters.description: End user (i.e. PSU) agent information, to be provided if TPP is in session with the PSU

parameters.name: X-Nordea-Originating-User-Ip
parameters.description: End user (i.e. PSU) IP address, to be provided if TPP is in session with the PSU

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number
parameters.x-availabilityInfo: V1 will be deprecated as it does not support QSealC. Please use V2

parameters.x-removalInfo: V1 will be replaced by V2

parameters.description: Page size

parameters.x-deprecationInfo: V2 will be available by Q3 2019
parameters.x-removalInfo: V1 will be replaced by V2

401.description:
Unauthorized with failure code:
* error.apikey.missing = Missing API key. This operation requires API key, but it was missing.
* error.token = Unspecified error with supplied token.
* error.token.invalid = Missing access token or token did not authorized requested operation. This operation requires valid access token, but it was missing.
* error.token.expired = Access token has expired.

get.x-availabilityInfo: V1 will be deprecated as it does not support QSealC. Please use V2

get.x-removalInfo: V1 will be replaced by V2

available_balance.description: Available balance indicates the funds which are available to the account holder at the time of the query

booked_balance.description: Booked balance includes all transactions entered on the account at the time of the query

country.description: Country code where the account is held according to ISO ALPHA-2

credit_limit.description: Amount of credit extended to account holder beyond account booked balance

latest_transaction_booking_date.description: Date of last transaction booked to the account

product.description: Name of the banking product delivered by this account

value_dated_balance.description: Value dated balance is the balance on the basis of which interest is calculated on the account

failures.description: More details on the occurred error

path.description: JSON path of the failing element if applicable

type.description: Type of the validation error, e.g. NotNull

href.description: Relative path to the linked resource

rel.description: Describes the nature of the link, e.g. 'details' for a link to the detailed information of a listed resource.

message_identification.description: Original request id for correlation purposes

balance_after_transaction.description: Balance on account after transaction executed

booking_date.description: Date transaction was booked to the account ledger

currency_rate.description: Currency exchange rate applied to foreign currency transactions

message.description: Message from remitter to beneficiary. In Finland this may alternatively include a short description of the transaction e.g. 'Automaattiotto'

original_currency_amount.description: Foreign transaction amount in original currency

own_message.description: Text message for the account holder's own use

transaction_date.description: Date on which transaction was enacted

transaction_id.description: Transaction identifier as defined by the bank

type_description.description: Description of the type of transaction, e.g. Cash withdrawal, Account transfer, etc. (localized)

value_date.description: Value date of the transaction, used for interest calculation

continuation_key.description: Resource listing may return a continuationKey if there is more results available. Request may be retried with the continuationKey, but otherwise same parameters, in order to get more results.

scopes.ACCOUNTS_PSD2: Scope for accessing accounts within psd2

DecoupledAuth.x-codeStatusDescription: Returns code when request if authorized
